name: Zoroark

passive.name: Illusion
passive.effect: Unless there is one there already, you may place an Evolution card on this Pokemon. This doesn't count as evolving this Pokemon. Treat this Pokemon as if it were that Pokemon instead. It cannot evolve or use the Pokemon Power of that Pokemon. This effect ends if any Special Condition affects this Pokemon, or by choice at any time during your turn.

attacks.name: Sneak Off
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokemon with a Pokemon from your Bench.

flavor: These Pokemon look strong, but their real strength is in imitating other Pokemon to trick their opponents.
